mapper.insert: INSERT INTO style (st_num, st_phrase, st_photo1n, st_photo2n, st_photo3n, st_photo4n, st_photo1, st_photo2, st_photo3, st_photo4, mem_num) VALUES( style_seq.nextval, #{st_phrase}, #{st_photo1n}, #{st_photo2n}, #{st_photo3n}, #{st_photo4n}, #{st_photo1}, #{st_photo2}, #{st_photo3}, #{st_photo4}, 1)
